a.xlink:title: Smallholder categories (Pakistan bands): marginal/subsistence <5 acres (~<2 ha), small/semi-commercial 5–12.5 acres; medium 12.5–25 acres. Tenure: owner-operator; revenue via lambardar.
flow=revenue/tax | I=settlement & revenue codes | K=post-Partition ledgers; assessment procedures | periodicity=annual | discretion=medium
Categories per skeleton summary (Pakistan census bands; <2 ha comparability).
Refugee allottees (Punjab): titles via Custodian/ Rehabilitation orders; typically in smallholder bands <5–12.5 acres; revenue via lambardar; warabandi at outlet.
flow=revenue/tax | I=evacuee/rehabilitation orders; mutation entries | K=allotment records; revenue rolls | periodicity=annual | discretion=medium
flow=revenue/tax (title regularization) | I=Custodian/ Rehabilitation mutation & regularization | K=allotment & settlement manuals | periodicity=annual | discretion=medium
Sindh tenancy persists: sharecropping (batai/adhi) ~50/50 with local cost-sharing; weak protections pre-1950; displacement pressures post-Partition.
flow=rent/share (crop) | I=customary tenancy (pre-1950); unsettled post-Partition | K=batai/adhi norms; cost-sharing conventions | periodicity=seasonal | discretion=high
flow=claims/authority | I=Hari Inquiry Committee recommendations (weak implementation) | K=petitions; inquiry records | periodicity=episodic | discretion=high
flow=command/authority | I=canal offences; revenue recovery powers | K=administrative circulars | periodicity=episodic | discretion=high
flow=command/authority | I=rehabilitation rules; local executive orders | K=allotment terms | periodicity=episodic | discretion=high
flow=command/authority | I=refugee settlement interactions; weak tenant protections | K=estate orders; informal discipline | periodicity=episodic | discretion=high
flow=water | I=CDA 1873 ops; departmental rules | K=duty tables; rating curves | periodicity=in-season | discretion=low
flow=water | I=departmental distribution rules | K=canal design tables | periodicity=in-season | discretion=medium
flow=water | I=canal codes; outlet allocation | K=mogha sizing; roster inputs | periodicity=in-season | discretion=medium
flow=water | I=canal codes; settlement records; roster enforcement | K=warabandi roster; local practice | periodicity=weekly/fortnightly | discretion=medium
flow=water | I=Custodian/Rehabilitation allotment & mutation orders | K=allotment rolls; settlement manuals | periodicity=weekly/fortnightly | discretion=medium
flow=water | I=weak tenancy protections; refugee settlement pressures | K=estate records; local rotation | periodicity=weekly/fortnightly | discretion=high

g.title: T_LiftDevices
g.text: T • Lift devices/tubewells (expanding but still limited)

a.xlink:title: flow=water | I=ad hoc/private | K=Persian wheel; early public/private tubewells | periodicity=seasonal | discretion=high
flow=water | I=private arrangement | K=custom devices; early pumps | periodicity=episodic | discretion=medium
flow=water | I=private arrangement | K=localized lift; pilot pump/tubewell schemes | periodicity=episodic | discretion=medium
flow=water | I=CDA 1873 continuity; seasonal allocations | K=hydraulic duty; kharif/rabi norms | periodicity=seasonal | discretion=low
flow=spatial/exclusion | I=loss of cultivated plots; no formal claims | K=resort to commons; seasonal wage work | periodicity=episodic/seasonal | discretion=high
